titleStmt.title: The booke of marchauntes very profitable to all folkes to knowe of what wares they ought to be ware of, for the begilyng of them. Newly perused and augmented by the first authoure well practised in suche doynges. Reade and profite.
Livre des marchans. English
titleStmt.author: Marcourt, Antoine de, d. ca. 1560.

titleStmt.author: Marcourt, Antoine de, d. ca. 1560.
Farel, Guillaume, 1489-1565, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: [[By J. Day?] and] are to be sold by Richard Iugge, at the North doore of Pouls. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum],

notesStmt.note: Sometimes also attributed to Guillaume Farel.
Translation of: Le livre des marchans.
Place of publication and publisher's name from colophon; printer's name conjectured by STC.
Running title reads: The marchaunts boke.

Reproduction of the original in the Emmanuel College Library.
